thread.title: $49+ O/W Airfare Sale from Virgin America
thread.title_full: $49+ O/W Airfare Sale from Virgin America

title: $49+ O/W Airfare Sale from Virgin America
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $49+ O/W Airfare Sale from Virgin America $49+ O/W Airfare Sale from Virgin America July 21, 2015 1:18pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
This ultra-limited-time sale from Virgin America discounts fall flights through midnight CT tonight for travel all across the U.S. Among the popular destinations included in the promotion are Austin, Boston, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. Fares are valid Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Saturdays between September 8 and November 18. One-way flights start at $49 (shown as $98 round-trip below). EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros: The sale applies to popular destinations on amenity-filled airplanes. Cons:
